abstract: Indian Prime Min Narendra Modi leads yoga demonstration in New Delhi, kicking off International Yoga Day holiday; holiday purports to restore national pride and begin return to ancient values in flawed modern age.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s government attempted to give new life to the idea that yoga can help restore national pride and a return to ancient values could help illness.

headline.main: International Yoga Day Finally Arrives in India, Amid Cheers and Skepticism
headline.print_headline: Yoga’s Day Arrives, in India and Beyond

snippet: Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s government attempted to give new life to the idea that yoga can help restore national pride and a return to ancient values could help illness.
